name: PuranikSIP
0:
”Alexa open puraniks s. i. p.”
”Alexa launch puraniks s. i. p.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: puraniks s. i. p.
des:
Puranik Builders Limited has been providing residential and commercial solutions for around 28 years. With time, they have successfully earned the trust of thousands of happy customers. Present in the prime locations of Thane, Pune, and Lonavala, Puraniks have created varied lifestyles with innovative amenities. 
 Rumah Bali brings alive the soothing beauty of Bali in Thane whereas Aldea Espanola adds touches of the vibrant and lively Spanish architecture in Pune. Puraniks City Reserva introduces innovative features like homes with Unshared Walls in Thane while Puraniks Sayama offers utmost relaxation with its Row Villas and amenities in Lonavala. These are just a few of the many existing offerings and many more are being planned. 
Puranik Builders Limited have staunch faith in the power of innovation, be it in designing their properties or marketing them. One such innovative marketing tool was employing Alexa to inform customers about their properties and schemes. 
Puranik exclusive alexa devices will be planted across the major Puranik sites. This voice device will be an innovative and intriguing way to engage the customers to share information on our newly launched product offering on SIP. The customers can ask questions from the given list of SIP based questions placed next to each of the alexa devices.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
